definition: to burn/to ignite/to light/fig. to spark off (hopes)/to start (debate)/to raise (hopes)
to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally

sentences.english: In the heating process of rolling reduction of fuel consumption and ignition loss is of great significance.
sentences.chinese: 軋鋼加熱過程中，降低燃耗與燒損具有重要意義。

sentences.english: The main factors affecting fuel consumption and ignition loss of industrial furnace are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了影響工業爐的燃耗與燒損的主要因素。

sentences.english: The present state of solid fuel consumption in the sintering system of Masteel No. 1 Iron Works is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了馬鋼第一鍊鐵廠燒結系統固體燃耗的現狀。

sentences.english: A dissolution method of sample for determining burn-up of power reactor fuel is described.
sentences.chinese: 文章介紹動力堆燃料燃耗測定中樣品的溶解方法。

sentences.english: The effective one-group cross sections used in the depletion code are calculated with Monte Carlo code.
sentences.chinese: 燃耗程序所使用的單羣截面由蒙特卡羅程序計算。

definition: power output (of an electrical device etc)
